segment.source: Deploying the MBAM 1.0 Language Release Update
segment.target: Deploying the MBAM 1.0 Language Release Update

segment.source: Deploying the MBAM 1.0 Language Release Update
segment.target: Deploying the MBAM 1.0 Language Release Update

segment.source: Deploying the MBAM 1.0 Language Release Update
segment.target: Deploying the MBAM 1.0 Language Release Update

segment.source: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) 1.0 Language Release is an update to MBAM and includes the support of new languages.
segment.target: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) 1.0 Language Release is an update to MBAM and includes the support of new languages.

segment.source: The MBAM 1.0 language update will change the version number from MBAM 1.0.1237.1 to MBAM 1.0.2001.
segment.target: The MBAM 1.0 language update will change the version number from MBAM 1.0.1237.1 to MBAM 1.0.2001.

segment.source: You do not need to reinstall all of the MBAM features in order to add these additional languages.
segment.target: You do not need to reinstall all of the MBAM features in order to add these additional languages.

segment.source: This topic defines the steps required to add the newly supported languages.
segment.target: This topic defines the steps required to add the newly supported languages.

segment.source: Deploy the MBAM international release to MBAM Server features
segment.target: Deploy the MBAM international release to MBAM Server features

segment.source: To begin, you must update the following MBAM server features:
segment.target: To begin, you must update the following MBAM server features:

segment.source: Then, you must run MbamSetup.exe to upgrade the MBAM features that run on the same server at the same time.
segment.target: Then, you must run MbamSetup.exe to upgrade the MBAM features that run on the same server at the same time.

segment.source: How to Install the MBAM Language Update on a Single Server
segment.target: How to Install the MBAM Language Update on a Single Server

segment.source: How to Install the MBAM Language Update on Distributed Servers
segment.target: How to Install the MBAM Language Update on Distributed Servers

segment.source: Install the MBAM language update for Group Policies
segment.target: Install the MBAM language update for Group Policies

segment.source: The MBAM Group Policy templates can be installed on each management workstation or they can be copied to the Group Policy central store, in order to make the templates available to all Group Policy administrators.
segment.target: The MBAM Group Policy templates can be installed on each management workstation or they can be copied to the Group Policy central store, in order to make the templates available to all Group Policy administrators.

segment.source: The policy templates cannot be directly installed on a domain controller.
segment.target: The policy templates cannot be directly installed on a domain controller.

segment.source: If you do not use a Group Policy central store, then you must copy the policies manually to each domain controller that manages MBAM Group Policy.
segment.target: If you do not use a Group Policy central store, then you must copy the policies manually to each domain controller that manages MBAM Group Policy.

segment.source: To add the MBAM language policies templates, copy the Group Policy language files from %SystemRoot%PolicyDefinitions on the computer where the “Policy Templates” role was installed to the same location on the workstation computer.
segment.target: To add the MBAM language policies templates, copy the Group Policy language files from %SystemRoot%PolicyDefinitions on the computer where the “Policy Templates” role was installed to the same location on the workstation computer.

segment.source: Here are some examples of Group Policy files:
